page.title: 16A Day in the life of Dafydd
page.content: In the morning I wash in the bedroom and get dressed into socks,shirt, shorts and tie.Then for breakfast I have Rice Krispies,orange juice and toast.I clean my teeth and pack my bag for school.In it I put a book,two sweets and a football sticker.I play a game on the computer or watch television until 8:48a.m.when it is time to get on the bus for school.When I arrive I play games with my friends in the playground.At 9:10a.m. a teacher blows the whistle and I stand still until it is time for my class to go inside.I sit at my table and read my book until we start maths.I listen to the teacher and then work from a text book.When I have finished I do a Reading Workshop card and go to Service in the hall.We often hear a good story about Jesus.I have my milk next and go to play tag outside.
